string.text:
SEALs is installed in your profile 
 
 SEALs displays badges (seals) on weapon icons determining some of their characteristics (e.g. 3D scopes, manufactorer). 
 
 and provenience (mod author, modlist etc.) 
 
 seals are also shows on the weapon's item detail tooltip

SEALs is configurable in the MCM menu 
 
 You can also toggle the display of the seals on the weapon icons using the keybind (by default, hold RIGHT_SHIFT). 
 
 You can also select which seals should appear and which not on the weapon icons.

Don't take it seriously 
 
 SEALs is just a fun project. 
 
 If you find it intrusive, disable it in the MCM menu or in the profile directly. 
 
 Otherwise, have fun.
